QueryDefinition.Query: select ch.person_id as PersonId, i.ins_type, i.encid, i.insurance_date, i.insurance_time, case when lower(i.ins_type) = 'commercial' then 418 when lower(i.ins_type) = 'medicare' then 280 when lower(i.ins_type) = 'medicaid' then 289 else 0 end as concept_id from {sc}.insurance i JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND i.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
